summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5287 for the improvement of the alley in Block 3, Laurelhurst Addition, being the alley from East 42nd Street to East 43rd Street, between 43rd Avenue Northeast and 45th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 61146, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
